website_summaries.verdict: An affordable liquid eyeliner in pen form that's easy to apply. Color isn't the darkest, but it's a good choice for consumers who prefer sheer shades or buildable eyeliner.
pros: This liquid eyeliner is designed for precision, thanks to the contoured grip and fine felt-tip point that makes it simple to create well-defined eyes and wing-tipped looks
Made by one of the most trusted names in drugstore cosmetics
cons: Doesn't hold up when exposed to moisture
Has the tendency to smudge after several hours of wear
If you prefer dark eyeliner, you may have to layer it

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AS DESCRIBED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said waterproof. Its im a Maybelline package that does not sat waterproof on it! They stook a sticker on the back saying waterproof which was a complete lie and waste of my time and money when I could have bought something that was truly waterproof. I'm very disappointed will never purchased again. I only had it on for a few hours and it ran so much that it got in my eyes and they are not swollen. I haven't even wet it or gotten it wet with anything
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! This eyeliner RUNS so bad. While I am applying it drips down into my eye (which burns) and then it settles into the corner of my eye or along my bottom line. It is so hard to get a good cat eye because it is so wet and runny that it makes a big blob of a mess on my wing. When I go to wipe it off, it just gets everywhere and I have to start everything over. I hate this thing. I used it about a week to see what I could change up to make it work, and nothing I did helped. Not using this thing again! Oh, but it is nice and black haha
customer_reviews.author: Jules B

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what it states on the package (disappointment)
customer_reviews.text: Well, at first I must say I was impressed....it applied so effortlessly and perfect. Now my problem.....it wasn’t waterproof, I had a tear eye today and it literally made the liner runny...since my make up was then damaged I decided to test yet another aspect....so I lightly tapped my makeup an hour after application, when my tears ruined it and it smudged!!! The package says it’s waterproof and smudge proof....I have had no issues with maybelline, and it’s all I use but I will never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: damaris cortez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Alright so I just got my big shipment of Amazon stuff but I've been sick with bronchitis and pneumonia for a couple of weeks so I haven't been able to up keep on make up for anything lately ... but While I am basically bedridden I have been testing out all of the make up I've gotten and reviewing it so here is the eyeliner review... I did one eye just to show that it's pretty good and very precise I also did my arm to show you. Over all very black and lasts long. Cant wait ti actually use it lol
customer_reviews.author: kelcie

customer_reviews.title: Way to thin and sheer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this liner as I was looking for an alternative to my usual Loreal Linuer Intense but this did not fit the bill. There was hardly any product in the bottle. It came out super thin and sheer. The applicator is wonderful but if the product doesn't come out it is useless. Usually eyeliner will get this way when it starts to get old but this one was like this from day one. I ended up giving it to my 10 year old daughter to play with. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I wear simple make-up, no cat eye or fancy details..simply because I can't lol. This eyeliner is like a thin marker. It stays where you put it, the color is saturated (best to store it with tip down). I've never had trouble with this liner. And if it works well with my simple application, I'm sure it would be great for detailed work. I think you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Terrible if you have oily skin or eyelids and poor pigmentation.
customer_reviews.text: Hand swatch results are definitely much different from how this actually wears on eyelids. It's not very pigmented unless you press down hard, which obviously doesn't work when using it on eyelids. Had to do a few coats to get it dark enough. It smears right off if touched at all and wears off fairly quickly. I do have oily lids, so for me, it doesn't have the staying power I'm looking for. I did use eye primer and had on eyeshadow, so I expected it to last a few hours at least. Thought this may be a cheap alternative but I'll be going back to Kat Von D.
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: It's a terrible combination. This stuff is a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God I've finally found it. I am atrocious with eyeliner. And I have hooded eyelids. It's a terrible combination. This stuff is a miracle. An absolute Godsend. It's easy to apply, goes on dark, doesn't smudge, and has stayed on for a 12 hour shift so far. My eyes aren't irritated, and it still looks good. I'm so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually not a fan or liquid liners but this makes it so easy it's hard to resist sometimes. If you are like me and have a hard time making an even line, this is your savior, the thin tip makes everything so easy to apply and since it doesn't dry immediately, if you make a mistake it's easy to clean up. This is also an eyeliner that will stay on for a long time, is has lasted the test of staying on in 100 degree weather even when you're sweaty. Overall I would highly recommend this product to anyone, people just starting to get into makeup and also the makeuo gurus, this is a very good go-to eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not always waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I misread the description and just ordered this based on the product name. But in the couple months I've been using this, it has frequently run and smudged when a bead of sweat or any moisture touches it. Ironically, while it doesn't work well for me during the day, it's difficult to remove with my eye makeup remover... This major con aside, the tip is very precise and holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Buneeb

customer_reviews.title: Issa no from me.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I expected this to be the waterproof version, but it's definitely not. Wipes right off. Smears all over the place and transfers like crazy on me. The shape of the felt tip is great and I've always loved the waterproof version of the master precise liquid liners, but this one isn't that and honestly I dunno why anyone would buy liquid liner that isn't waterproof. I guess this is fine, if you want your eyeliner all over your face by noon. You do you. I gave it to my 6 year old to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kaboom

customer_reviews.title: The very best liquid liner.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a recommendation for this liner in a review for a much more expensive liner I was debating buying. I’m so glad I bought this instead of the pricier liner. This goes on easier than any liquid liner I’ve ever used. It makes a super thin line that you can easily make thicker if needed. It stays put and still looks great hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey J.

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT WATERPROOF, IF YOU SWEAT A LITTLE IT WILL BE SMEAR OFF
customer_reviews.text: The product is not water resistant at all, if I sweat a little it smears off and it runs off so bad, I hated this product so dissatisfied I have wear maybelline products for over 10 years and this is the first time that I hated one of their products so much, do not waste your money on this eyeliner , unless you want to wear it under your eyes and down your cheeks, now I have to buy a new eyeliner that is actually waterproof, because I can not look like a crazy woman at work using this crappy product
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Will not by this again. I was hoping this would be really convenient. After reading reviews I saw that some people had trouble with it drying out but wouldnt be a problem if u just stored it lid side down so the ink would pull towards the tip. Well that does not work for crap. I had to shake it pretty hard several times between each use (even between each eye) and that still wasnt enough to get nice dark lines. This thing sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use drugstore eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: Great drugstore eyeliner. Very easy to apply- it's similar to writing with a pen or extra-fine tip sharpie, but with a more flexible applicator. The applicator has just the write amount of stiffness. Would recommend to anyone who is new to eyeliner or who wants something that is quick and easy to apply. The color is very dark, striking black- it appears darker than kohl or pencil eyeliners. It is more similar-looking to a dark-black gel eyeliner. The product runs out fairly quickly- I think mine lasted approximately a month. If you store it upside down the pigment will stay near the applicator more easily.
customer_reviews.author: BlaireTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner! User friendly! Easy wings.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite eyeliner currently. Affordable, but performs well. Easy to apply and get a sharp wing. Rich, dark, and matte black. The felt tip is perfectly shaped for my personal taste and style, I have an easy time using it and getting a fabulous look with it. Wears really well for hours and hours. Doesn’t run or flake or smudge very easily. Doesn’t sweat off and I live in southern AZ.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely my new favorite eyeliner. I was hesitant because some of the reviews said it would transfer but the people in the reviews had pictures of oily eyelids and no eyeshadow or setting powder on their lids which would make ANY liner transfer. Oil will break down any makeup that's what primers are for, and thats why makeup removers have oils so don't be deterred by the negative reviews because this eyeliner literally doesn't budge at all. I really love how thin the felt tip is it goes on so smoothly and it's a perfect dark matte black
customer_reviews.author: Noone

customer_reviews.title: and came off easily with face wash
customer_reviews.text: The real deal. I put it on at about 1 pm, went out in the sweaty heat, and accidentally fell asleep at 10:30 without taking it off. It was still pristine the next morning when I woke up, and came off easily with face wash. It initially went on a little shiny and reflective, but dried down matte, and was easy to sharpen and clean up. I usually don't love felt tip eyeliners, but I really enjoyed the applicator on this one. I have the oiliest lids on planet earth and this eyeliner stood the test of glory.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Everyday use, my favorite wing liner!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the old formula more. The new pink stripe package liner is slightly smaller and maybe a thinner consistency. I like the old style better. It's really good eyeliner. I prefer this over Kat Von D and Urban Decay. I can buy whatever I want... I choose this. Use a primer for the most longevity.. I use Urban Decay primer potion and I can sleep with it minimal wearing or shifting. Without primer it will move if you have oily eyelids... as I do. Anyway i have this on auto ship.
customer_reviews.author: moongoddess

customer_reviews.title: My Least Favorite Maybelline Product
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend says: I generally like eyeliner in this form as it is easy to apply and great for creating a perfect wing. I do like the intensity of the color, it is a nice black matte however, the lasting power is awful. Within a few hours of applying to my lid it is transferring up into my crease. Even when using a high end primer it doesn't seem to stay put. It's most certainly not water proof and I wouldn't purchase again based only on the fact that it transfers too much. There are many other eye liners in this form from different brands that do not have the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: JGtzTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Budgeproof
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I can keep on my oily lids. It's got a nice tapered tip that goes to a sharp point, so I can use it however thin or thick I want my line to be, and as close to my eyelashes as I can get. The color is the blackest of blacks and dries flat, not shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up with side note problem
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. Update: was hoping to leave vendor feedback rather than mention this in the product review, but I've purchased this eyeliner several times and while I love it, they need to use a cap that snaps in place more securely. The cap has fallen off in my makeup bag just from jostling around in a suitcase. This results in a dried out eyeliner that has to be discarded. I had to toss a brand new eyeliner because of that. Maybelline, if you are reading this, please take a look at the cap for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bemo

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: Subtle panda eyes...but panda eyes nonetheless. The liner applies nicely and I loved the fine tip to draw precise lines on my hooded eyes. I was very pleased...until just 3 hours after application, I started noticing panda eyes. I used this with a shadow primer and shadow. It wasn't a particularly hot day so I wasn't sweating nor do I have oily skin/lids. The liner did not irritate my eyes and so I wasn't teary either. I suppose my search continues for a liner that doesn't leave me panda-like.
customer_reviews.author: L&J's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good for short amounts of time, doesn't last all day
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst liquid eyeliner I've ever used, but definitely not the best. As stated in the description, it DOES go on looking nice, dark, blackest-black. However, it's not very long lasting. After a few hours I noticed it started to transfer onto my lid and smudged a little onto my lower lid. I am also not a fan of the tip - it's a felt-type tip, but not flexible as I imagined it would be, so I find it quite hard to wing out and create sharp lines. I wouldn't purchase this again, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Does not move!
customer_reviews.text: I could NOT GET THIS OFF! I scrubbed and scrubbed and it was so difficult to get off that night, I used it again another night and I couldn’t get it off even the next day. I had a swimming with the dolphins excursion and lo and behold, my wing tip wouldn’t budge. I decided during the presentation and the rules, I’d take a napkin and try getting it off.... I looked like a raccoon. With the help of my fiancé, we were able to blend it into my hairline (I have black hair) so I didn’t look like a total mess. This stuff holds better than some of the more expensive makeup I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Cap comes off
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, however the cap continuously came off in my makeup bag. Without the cap on, it would staining everything it touched. This happened on multiple occasions so I had to throw it away. If a better cap was made I would have given it more stars. Overall, if you don’t have to carry around your makeup, this would be a great product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Lizinzi DiLernia

customer_reviews.title: G00D
customer_reviews.text: First I'd like to say, NEVER shake this ***** like you have to with other pens it literally gets everywhere and it puts bubbles in it that pop out afterwards x.x The pen is awesome, I only shook it because I had been over using a side but you really only have to turn it upside down every so often while applying. Works GREAT, every pen is a little different so it takes a small adjustment period but after you get it down you get fine eyes every time <3
customer_reviews.author: Adia Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect detail, easy to correct mistakes
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It goes on smoothly and I am able to get perfect detail on the inner corner of my eyelids and do a perfect cat eye. It makes for very thin line that you can “build on”, which I love because it doesn’t look as “drastic” as a regular liquid liner and if I do make a mistake it’s super easy to correct.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Easy for those who aren't great w/ putting on liner!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly terrible with gel liners and painting things on. The actual liner pencils just hurt to put on, an irritate my eye, so these marker-like liners are awesome. Trying to get the other liners to look normal and symmetrical can drive me INSANE and takes forever! I usually use the Jordana brand of these from Walgreens for $2, but those smell like heavy chemicals, and don't keep fine lines for long after purchase. This has no scent, and the line stays thin and precise. I'll update my review if it doesn't last long. This is worth it already for me, because I don't smell like I painted household cleansers on my sensitive eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: LA Camp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner ever. I hope they never discontinue this. I have been using this since I was in high school, I am now moving on to graduate school and even though a lot of my makeup routine has changed, I am sticking with this eyeliner pen. I wear it every day and because it has a sharp edge, you can use it to create a big winged eye or a subtle tightline. Since it is waterproof, once it dries, it does not smudge. I have oily skin and oily eyelids and it never smudged, not even on hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is easy to use and precise
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and precise! It is not super BOLD in its black, but it still works for everyday use. Because the tip is fine and in marker form, it is easy to apply and to make precise. However, the product does smudges easily. Which means it is easy to take off, but also means that wear-time is not super long and it might get smudgy during the day. Overall, I would totally recommend this product as the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: WSC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not all day
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this stuff, I really did. The pen and felt tip itself are awesome and easy to use, but this formula is NOT long lasting or smudge proof. You can smudge it very easily once it dries, and after a few hours it smudge even more easily. It's such a bummetlr. If you have hooded eyes you should really, really avoid this because it's going to be a mess after a few hours and there are a ton of eyeliners in this price range that have much better staying power. Great pen/tip, but definitely not a great formulation.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, goes on smoothly and precisely
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not water or smudge proof but I didn't really expect it to be. Goes on super easy and looks great for even a makeup klutz like me! I really like the tip and the way the color flows out. Not too much not too little. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not perfect but still great
customer_reviews.text: not super waterproof, and it does smudge a bit, but it works well for a normal work day if you don't sweat a lot! I unfortunately work outside a lot so I end up pretty sweaty at times and it moves around a lot! But on a day off or if I don't sweat much it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Far from “all day” liner.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while for it to dry and it seemed ok at first. An hour after applying, I looked it the mirror and it had smeared all over. Even after it dries, if you touch it, it smears. I’ve tried different ways to apply but it smears so easily and does not stay on. L’Oréal Infallible pen liner is way better.
customer_reviews.author: healthygirl

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I got my hopes up for this affordable eyeliner since it was supposed to last “all day” as advertised, thought it could be a cheaper alternative to Kat Von D ink liner. The truth is it didn’t even last me through half a day and I don’t even have oily eyelids. I guess you get what you pay for, right?
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Not all day - smudges easy - goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner does go on smooth and very easy. However it comes off just as easy and smudges at the slightest touch. Even without a small eye touch I notice the liner fading into my eye creases and giving the dark circle eye look. My skin is not oily so it's not smearing because of that. It's just not a true all day liner. Pay a little extra and go for the higher end brands such as Stilla and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: The first application of this is perfect after that it starts to become a struggle to ...
customer_reviews.text: The first application of this is perfect after that it starts to become a struggle to do the whole line in one motion. The tip works awesome on cat eyes in the beginning. Really quickly it kind of turns into something like a dried up marker. Even if you leave the lid on and shake it before use. I can't justify buying something that I can only get a few good uses out of even if it is pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JMZ

customer_reviews.title: Ironically my Favorite Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Ironically, despite not being very smudge-proof or water-resistant, this is my favorite eyeliner. The long burst makes it so easy to glide across and stay straight at the same time. I am set to subscribe and save because it doesn't last a crazy long time, but it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Intense black liner
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect liquid liner, especially if you are wanting that tapered off winged look. Too bad for me that I still haven't perfected winged eyeliner, but that's my problem not the liners. The tip is soft and flexible, yet comes to a sharp point for extreme precision. I really liked this, because you can apply your liner as thin or thick as you want because of the tip. The color is an intense jet black and goes on very smoothly. If you're new to liquid liners or a bit inexperienced, this is still a great liner to experiment with and help perfect your winged liner.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT smudge proof nor water resistant. I have cried/had my eyes water with this on and it instantly comes off in big black smudges. It is not long lasting either. This liner is overall false advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of things I like about this eyeliner and 1 thing I dont. The tip is fine, it ink flows evenly and smoothly. I don't know if this is truly waterproof since a hour into the day it smudges if used on the bottom lashes, mainly mid to bottom corner. Its good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Seems that the formula has changed
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite liquid eyeliner for the longest time. However, something about the formula is different. It felt watered-down from the first use, and it certainly didn't stay put. I used to wear this in the morning and after a full day at work followed by a hour at the gym my wings would be going strong, but now I'm lucky if it makes it to lunchtime (and I have a sweat-free office job). I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Yass.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I got it for a wedding, and I've worn it a bunch of times since then. Believe the other reviews, it's definitely worth your money. No smudging, no irritation, definitely waterproof, really intense color, easy to apply. I don't think I'll ever even try another eyeliner because this one checks all the boxes, for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner--comparable to Lorac and Stila
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with the Lorac liquid eyeliner (I like it better than the Stila one because it goes on smoother) but decided to test out a few drugstore brands to see how they compared. The pen is very similar to the Lorac and Stila pen and it goes on great. It stays on my eyes all day (I have very oily skin too) and is as black as the Lorac and Stila liners. The Lorac liner definitely stays on a little better if it gets a little wet, but overall for the price it's a great buy. I'll probably stick to this one from now on!
customer_reviews.author: miss sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great starter eye liner
customer_reviews.text: This is my first liquid eye linger. The application is awesome. I did some research before buying, and everyone raved about the large felt tip applicator. This is definitely the highlight of the product. It is so easy to apply, even for a beginner. However, the product seems to fade after about 4 hours. By the end of my work day, the black seems more of a gray. This was a great first piece to trial and error with, but I am still on the hunt for a deeper black that will stay that color all day.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner I’ve Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: This is the first liquid liner I’ve ever bought. I had used the highest rated pencils and gels previously, but they never went on smoothly. This gives a sharp, pristine, crisp black line. I am VERY satisfied with my purchase. I don’t think buying the higher end Stila or Too Face is necessary. This Maybelline is the same caliber.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT but
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased the set of two I didn't use it right away because I had another one (different brand) When I decided to use it, worked great, the second time it was already running out!! Third almost left no mark. And finally fourth time it didn't work anymore. I haven't opened the other one because I was very disappointed. But it was over 30 days by the third time so I couldn't even return anymore
customer_reviews.author: grace v. nunez

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a thick, good quality eyeliner this is the thing for you. The applicator/tip of the eyeliner if very fine, and gets thicker near the bottom, so its great to make all different styles. The black is very pure and overall its great.
customer_reviews.author: JimHro35

customer_reviews.title: I saw all these good reviews so I decided to buy it
customer_reviews.text: I saw all these good reviews so I decided to buy it. However, the tip has been DRY from the moment I got it. It's so dry that it even can't be applyed. It's totally a waste of money. I hope I just got an deffective one. It's definitely the worst eyeliner I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Qi

customer_reviews.title: Better than pencil for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give this a try because all the eye pencils I've tried never lasted well all day, and I've tried many, even some pretty expensive ones. This stuff works great for me! If you have a fairly steady hand it applies well. . It's my go-to eyeliner and stays on all day and maybe just needs a little touch up if I go out at night. It lasts a pretty long time too, I've had them for several months before drying out.
customer_reviews.author: susank

customer_reviews.title: Precise line. Long wear.
customer_reviews.text: After having tried endless eyeliner that are hard to apply or smear or fade, this one is the holy grail! Perfect! Precise line. Be sure you let it dry fully (takes a few seconds) before you touch it or open your eye or the color smudges. But once it’s dry it stays out. If I don’t take it off it looks almost perfect the next day too.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesotagal

customer_reviews.title: Easy application and longwearing!
customer_reviews.text: I really found this eyeliner to be such a pleasure applying! I got a nice thin and even line and was even able to use below my eyes without looking overly dramatic. This mascara comes at a great price and probably works much better and smudges less than my department store eyeliners. I’m very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: FindersKeepers

customer_reviews.title: Constant smearing & smudging
customer_reviews.text: Cons: rubs off, smudges, smears like CRAZY. I have been using it for about two weeks and I'm fixing it all day long. Pros: easy application and nice black color. Definitely unsubscribing in search of one that doesn't smear so much. Need something more trustworthy in public!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Really like the product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second tube. I work in an office and feel that make up is a requirement for appearing professional. It is really the only make up I wear. I like that it goes on well, smoothly and accurately. You can definitely do a cat eye with no problems. But and this is a 2 sided but... it smears and rubs off. Which means that I might look like I'm no longer wearing makeup at the end of the day. But it also doesn't look like I have a black eye in the morning. I'm not high on makeup maintenence so I see the no black eyes in the morning as way better than the rub off.
customer_reviews.author: L D Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy does it with this liner. It takes a soft stroke to give you the right look. If you use a heavy handed stroke it will look way too thick. Practice. I’m an artist so it was easy for me. I highly recommend the soft stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing liner!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this liner for my wings. I like winged liner, cat eyes, and this tip is perfect for it. I've used this same kind for the list 2 years now and I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Really Suprised
customer_reviews.text: I had considered buying the stilla version but the reviews on the two eye liners were the same so I chose this as it was 1/4th the price, I honestly didn't think it would go on as well as it does but it's very smooth and goes on easily with a 10x magnification mirror. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin straight lines.
customer_reviews.text: It glides on very smooth and makes it very easy to get a nice thin line. I've switched over to this after using my other lipid liner for years. It does come off with water, but I don't mind. As long as my eyes aren't getting very wet, it will stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: MissChancelot

customer_reviews.title: A little smudgy
customer_reviews.text: I like the accuracy of this eyeliner. It resembles a felt tip pen, nice and stiff. I've had it for months and use it every couple days, and it's still going strong. It does usually take going over twice to get a super black line, and I have to sit with my eyes closed while it dries if I do a thicker line on my upper lid. If I dont, it smudges on to the top of my lid. I don't have hooded eyes, so I don't know why this happens. Sometimes it even happens after letting it dry. Overall it's a great starter liquid eyeliner, but I'll probably try a different brand once it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The design of the pen and precision tip is ideal for putting the eyeliner on. Unfortunately my eyelids and skin are oily. I was hoping this eyeliner would last as long as it claims to, but I can’t even go 4 hours into my work day without it transferring under my eyes. Others may have better luck than me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, stiff marker tip, best for thin lines.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use even for makeup novices. Very black, matte color. Thin, stiff, marker style but has a slightly flexible tip so it doesn't tug on your skin. Easy to make a super think even line along the lashes. Amazing basic liner everyone needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robotham

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget piece but probably worth spending the extra $10 if you can..
customer_reviews.text: Bought for significant other who had the following to say: Amazingly precise brush, but the formula itself is not great. Expect smudging if you have normal to oily skin, or if there is any humidity in the air. This product also takes longer to dry than other, higher end eyeliners - if you are applying in a rush as I often do, you might want to avoid. I personally would rather shell out the extra money for a more reliable eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Zar

customer_reviews.title: perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something that applies nice! AND it doesn’t smudge/bleed on my eyelids! 👍🏼 ..I was paying $20 for all these other expensive brands! 👎🏼 ..Found this here for $6! Thank you Amazon! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Misaki

customer_reviews.title: Great Liner at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using liquid liner for years, and this is one of my favorites. It has a felt tip that creates a nice line, and I like the pen-like shape, which makes it easier for me to use on myself and others. My liner will last the whole day, even in hot TX weather. With lots of use, one pen lasted me a few months. Sadly, I throw them out at 3-4 months (nervous about germs) even though it still had some use in it. :( I hate wasting product. Anyway, I like it, it's a great product, and the price is great. Some of the more expensive brands are a waste of extra cash.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The brush is too wide at the tip for my liking. I wish it came to more of a point because I feel it would make application more accurate. I do end up with “skipping” on my lid when I use this liner and I have to use an eyeshadow primer under it or I end up with smudging around the edges of my lower lash line halfway through the day. It was worth trying for the price point, but I don’t think I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: secretrosegard

customer_reviews.title: Not that good...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back, when I wanted to be the best at wings. I tried it and it was good the first time, I thought it looked and felt really smooth. The second time I applied it (like 2 days later), it seemed almost dried out. I tried with primer, without primer, on eyeshadow, and... It never worked again as good as the first time. And the tip got frayed.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Was hoping for a liner that didn't end ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Was hoping for a liner that didn't end up below my eyes...this one didn't last long before it was more below my eyes than lining them. It also really irritated my eyes which surprised me since I'm not very sensitive and cosmetics rarely irritate my skin or eyes. The search continues...
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to use (most of the time.)
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear eyeliner every day 15 years ago but opted to go simplier the last few years however, I am now back on an eyeliner kick depending on the outfit. I typically wear prestige brands but for something i only wear sporadically, i opted for drugstore brand. This exceeds my expectations in that it goes on smooth, draws accurately and stays throughout the day with no touchups. The only thing I dont like about and why I took off one star is if you mess up, it is easier to just take it all off and start again. A little bit of wiggle room in the drying time would be nice to fix any mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: NC Darling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Restarant worker or summer eye liner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye liner. I work in a Restarant so it is a pain finding any makeup that actually stays on most of the day. This defiantly did and was not incredibly hard to get off; it actually wiped pretty much right off. Very good product. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, but difficult to apply and does not go on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I chose this liquid eyeliner after reading the great reviews. While the color looked nice, it did not go on smoothly at all! The description says it does not skip, but it did for me. Also, the very tip of the liner does not hold makeup. You have to hold it horizontally and use the whole side of the pen to get it to go on properly. Also, the pen tends to fray, and little strings have to be cut off every few days to keep it from making extra messy lines when applying. Once this one is empty, I won't be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Intense color and easy to apply but it smudges, which to me totally kills the product... I tried to use it as a dupe for the one from stilla (which I'll be going back to, even though its 4x the price of this one). The picture I'm attaching was taken when I had no clue the eyeliner had smudged. Maybe in dryer weather it would work better, but not in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Santana

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to last and it does
customer_reviews.text: I put it close to my lashes in a thin line. It lasts all day, even if I rub my eyes. Problem is it looks uneven because it is a little more difficult to get straight. I just go over it with pencil to smooth it out. But to be fair, I have old eyes and don't put it on as well as when I was 30.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it second time because I liked and I received this contour. It is very very dry, very bad. I had no chance to use it. I really wanted to sent it back, unfortunately I threw away the outside package. I am so disappointed 😔 It's just a garbage, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gantuya Davaajav

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eyeliner for a couple of years now and it is the best I have found and definitely well worth the price! I wear hard contact lenses and this eyeliner has never given me a problem with my eyes. I put it only on my top lid and it lasts all day (I touch up in the evening if going out) without smudging. It does, however, come off easily when washing up, I don't even need to use an eye make-up remover! The lines are precise as promised and I find it easy to work with. I have actually received compliments on my eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Champa

customer_reviews.title: Lid not secure, dried out
customer_reviews.text: The cap to this liner didn't 'click' closed or screw on, therefore being very loose. The first time I put it into my travel bag the lid popped off and ran away somewhere, so the eyeliner effectively dried out before I could even use it more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda M. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Stays On!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't. even put this on yet but I accidentally got a nice line on my finger when I was opening it. The liner too a bit of work to come off and the line was perfect 😂 I look forward to using it on my face lol
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Cedano

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dark pigmented lines!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because of how dark each stroke is. It's the blackest of black and stays on all day long. Although as soon as it touches water it does start to wear. But as long as you're not crying or getting wet it should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Smears
customer_reviews.text: This product applied very nicely. However, it smeared very easily even after being on my eyelid for over 15 minutes. I cleaned that up but at the end of the day I had some raccoon eyes. I have been using a similar product from Ulta and it is much better. I will go back to that product.
customer_reviews.author: River diva

customer_reviews.title: Much easier than others I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not particularly good at applying eyeliner, but this is the best I've found so far! I like the fact that it's liquid, but also a pen, so it's easier to draw one straight line at once. I have no idea how it would rank for makeup artists, but for someone like me just doing simple eyeliner for an everyday look, it's dark and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Liquid Eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at tons of different brands and reviews, I'm so happy I decided on the Maybelline Master Precise All Day Liquid Eyeliner Makeup Waterproof. It dries almost instantly after applying it which is by far my favorite thing. Other brands would always take some time to dry and then I would get marks on my upper eyelid which would be more hassle than anything. The Maybelline Master Precise All Day Liquid Eyeliner Makeup Waterproof lasts all day and doesn't smudge. My winged eyeliner looks wonderful! It is also comfortable to hold and use. The brush on the end of the pen is great for winged eyeliner. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Van Hasselt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good eyeliner previously I used elf’s but I needed a new eyeliner on short notice so I bought this one and I love it. The tip hasn’t frayed yet and I’ve had it a few months and the color is still pretty pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad pen
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come off my eyes that well with makeup remover and the eyeliner doesn't want to come out. If you want to sketch all over your eye until you get something out, and until you can make a visible line, this is probably not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: It goes on just the way I like it and stays on
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It goes on nicely and I don't have smudges around my eyes. It stays on even after I use my eyelash curler. I have been looking for a liner like this for years.
customer_reviews.author: janice hopperton

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you like black eyes!
customer_reviews.text: By the time you finish putting on makeup it’s already black on under of your eye. By the time you leave your home, you’ve successfully turned into a zombie—congratulations.
customer_reviews.author: N W

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth trying for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used liquid eyeliner on the tops of my lids for a few years now and this is one of my favorite liquid eyeliners that I've ever used. It's super easy to apply and helps to keep the lines straight. The tube also lasts a good while. I generally only apply once in the morning, but I will occasionally touch up if we go out in the evening. Otherwise, it goes on smoothly and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: While tip hold up, poor pigment and amount of product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor quality, the tip holds up at least but the pigment and amount of product for the size is lacking. Only used this, sparingly at that, about 15x before it starting running out. And had to trace over a few times to get a solid black line.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: def NOT water proof at all. I live in ...
customer_reviews.text: def NOT water proof at all. I live in las vegas, NV and in the 100 heat it just runs when you sweat even a little bit. Even with my make up finishing spray still did not stay put. And forget about accidentally touching your face where you have them, it smears...not worth the buy at all
customer_reviews.author: LaRue

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT EYELINER
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner goes on exceptionally easy. The tip is not a brush; it is something quite solid with a very slim pointed tip that allows you to vary the line you apply. At the inside corner of my eye I start off with the slim point and then lay more of the tip down as I get to the center of the eye and then lift up to only the thin point as I get to the outside edge of the eyelid. It reminds me of a Magic Marker. Very black. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: NJNANCY

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, the pigment is an intense black and it stays put even during long work days. It also hasn't seemed to dry out as quickly as I would've expected for an inexpensive eyeliner. The quality stands up to my Clinique liquid eyeliner pen, and at roughly 1/3 of the cost! I'm definitely buying another when this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Litow

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality and long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Not the product's fault but I find liquid eyeliner hard to master lol. This is a good quality and long lasting product however!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft it glides on and with such precision. best I have ever used. Waiting to see how genuinely waterproof and smudge proof it is though. corner came off just a tad when my eye watered and I lightly dabbed with my finger. But just slight. So far I'm loving it
customer_reviews.author: Erin gursslin

customer_reviews.title: LASTED ALL DAY AND NIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good eyeliner for my wedding. This stuff goes on smooth and precise! With my eye primer and shadow underneath, it lasted all day and was still in place the next morning( not that I needed it to be! ha) Great product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: candace c.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, worth it, WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is AMAZING. The tip is thin enough that it's easy to work with and no smudging when you go to draw the cat eye. I was using regular liquid liner before this and used to have to correct my cat eye almost every time I drew it, but this draws a straight line perfectly every time. I was even getting ready with one of my friends who uses mostly high end makeup brands and loaned it to her because she was getting annoyed with her liquid eyeliner and even she LOVED it. I'd say this is easily comparable to the Stila eyeliner, but with a much better price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Dried out upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just received an old one, but this stuff is HORRIBLE! I feel like I have to pull my eyelids with it in order for the color to even come out onto my lids. The tip that is so small, does not give out any color what-so-ever, only the thicker area when pressed really hard. My worst purchase ever in terms of eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: phillygirl301

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Point
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this makeup pen, it's super easy to use and I get a beautiful thin line every time. There's not much product so it's doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Budget-friendly, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: For a liquid eyeliner, this product meets the marks. It's very easy to apply, which is the best feature of this eyeliner (besides the price). However, this may be due in part to my own failings, but I feel the black color doesn't come on as strong as I'd like. Sometimes I get a thin, slightly translucent layer when I try to apply, and reapplying over it works a little. Other times, I get that strong, opaque black I'm aiming for. Overall, definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've an avid 'gel' eyeliner user. Ive used Maybelline's Gel Liner in Blackest Black for years and love it, but I've heard good things with this and thought I'd give it a shot. I love it! It's so precise and very black. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lenich

customer_reviews.title: FADES AND SMUDGES.Definitely not all day and VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: I like how thin and precise you can be with the brush but it's rather pointless when the liquid eye liner smudges onto your eyelids even after you ensured that it is dry. I bought this eye liner because I wanted to find an alternative to the eyeliner that I have been using because I can only get them from Asia. I wore this eyeliner every other day to make sure that I was making a fair comparison with the other eyeliner but this eyeliner fades and smudges within the hour of putting it on. Definitely not all day and VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.author: Thadya V

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright, pretty good if you don’t smudge easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! The tip is really fine and I’m able to style a lot with it. It does smudge quite easily though — when I smile, the eyeliner gets on the bottom of my eye easily, so throughout the day, it gets less and less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: HanFam

product_meta.title: Maybelline Eyestudio Master Precise All Day Liquid Eyeliner Makeup, Black, 0.034 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: Size:1 Count| Color:BlackMaster the art of the winged eyeliner with the Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner 2013. Maybelline New York’s Eyestudio Master Precise Liquid Eyeliner delivers laser-sharp precision for the most defined line. The liquid eyeliner features an ultra-fine 0.4 millimeter brush felt tip to deliver precise definition in one single stroke. The ink intensity pen’s continuous flow provides smooth even lines for the perfect cat eye. The highly pigmented formula will keep your eyeliner look last all day, for up to 12 hours. The waterproof and smudge proof liquid eyeliner is fragrance free and is ophthalmologist and dermatologist tests. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
feature_bullets: NO-SMUDGE LIQUID EYELINER: Precise, sharp lines. Intense color. No smudge. Up to 12hr wear. Maybelline Master Precise All Day liquid eye liner pen stays put all day with whatever look you're working

DEFINE YOUR EYE: No eye look is complete without Maybelline Eyeliner--amp up the drama with a black eyeliner pen, get playful with a green or blue eye liner, or take a softer approach with brown eyeliner. Remove waterproof eyeliner with a makeup remover

MAYBELLINE IS THE EYE EXPERT: Whatever your signature eye look, whether natural or dramatic, Maybelline helps create looks that draw eyes. With a broad selection of pencil & liquid eyeliners, highly pigmented eyeshadows, iconic mascara, & eyebrow makeup

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup

specifications.Manufacturer: Maybelline, Consumer Products Division of L’Oréal USA S/D, Inc.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
